entry.title: 3M 8374 - MSP Sprayable Seam Sealer in Grey - 10.5 fl. Oz (310 ml) 7000142623
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Seam Sealers
Price: 33.60

[shortdesc]

3M MSP Sprayable Seam Sealer, 08374, grey, 10.5 fl. oz. (310 ml)

  • 3M™ MSP Sprayable Seam Sealer, 08374, is a high-solids, moisture-curing seam sealer that can be caulked or sprayed as a sealer or a sound deadening coating
  • The sealer provides a fast method of sealing trunk and floor pan seams, quarter panel seams, and any other seam where a sprayed or coated appearance is necessary
  • Bead can be used for general purpose automotive seams, including door skins, rocker panels, rear body panels, trunk seams, floor pans, etc
  • Sprayed seam can be used for trunk seams, quarter panels, any other OEM sprayed seam replacement
  • Sprayed coating can be used inside door skins, inside body panels, or any area where a sound deadening coating is needed.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Seam Sealers
    Size 10.5 fl. Oz, 310 ml

    Product Information

  • High performance, general-purpose seam sealer
  • Able to produce a bead, sprayed seam, or sprayed coating appearance
  • Excellent adhesion to primed metal and aluminum
  • Fast curing and immediately paintable
  • Very low solvent percentage
  • Non-shrinking
  • Non-cracking

    • Suggested Application

  • For use on door skins, hemming flanges, quarter panel seams, and floor and trunk pans
  • Adheres well to all primed surfaces except acrylic lacquer
  • Applying over bare metal will not provide enough corrosion protection.
  • Acid etching primer is not recommended
    		•
